In this essay I will explain why the US is a bad place to live and how it got that way. 
 
 The United States has been in decline for quite some time now. It was once one of the most powerful countries on earth. But now we are just another third world country with no real influence over our own destiny. We have become so dependent upon foreign oil that we can barely afford it.
